changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE finance.transactions ( id INTEGER GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY, amount DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, category VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL CHECK (transaction_type IN ('INCOME', 'EXPENSE')), email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_user_email FOREIGN KEY (email) REFERENCES finance.users(email) );
